com.rolemodelsoft.drawlet.examples.jfc
Class SimpleScrollingPanel

java.lang.Object
  |

        |

              +--javax.swing.JComponent
                    |
                    +--javax.swing.JPanel
                          |
                          +--com.rolemodelsoft.drawlet.examples.jfc.SimplePanel
                                |
                                +--com.rolemodelsoft.drawlet.examples.jfc.SimpleScrollingPanel
public class SimpleScrollingPanel
extends SimplePanel

This is a beginning attempt at a scrolling implemenation with JFC. There are obvious problems, possibly dealing with the ViewPort, at least in VisualAge (it has not yet been tested outside). Hopefully it will at least give you an idea for how to implement it, and the problems may be fixed either outside of VisualAge or in Java 2.

See Also:
